entry.name: first
entry.title: .first()
entry.desc: Reduce the set of matched elements to the first in the set.

longdesc.p: Given a jQuery object that represents a set of DOM elements, the .first() method constructs a new jQuery object from the first element in that set.
Consider a page with a simple list on it:
We can apply this method to the set of list items:
The result of this call is a red background for the first item.

example.desc: Highlight the first item in a list.
